document.full_text: phillip garrido, who pleaded guilty to kidnapping 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years, was sentenced on thursday to 431 years to life in prison.
document.title: dugard kidnapper sentenced to life in prison
lines_and_colors: phillip garrido, who pleaded guilty to kidnapping 11-year-old jaycee lee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years, was sentenced on thursday to 431 years to life in prison.
